scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'ANVIL,API,RELAY' -c 'magenta,blue,cyan' 'cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat node --hostname 0.0.0.0' 'USE_ANVIL=true RELAY_URL=ws://localhost:9000 ANVIL_RPC=http://localhost:8545 bun runtime/server.ts --port 8080' 'bun runtime/networking/ws-server.ts --port 9000'
scripts.test:contracts:r2r: cd jurisdictions && bunx hardhat run test-r2r-post-deployment.cjs --network localhost
scripts.test:governance: cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat test --grep governance
scripts.test:entity: cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat test --grep entity
scripts.check:all: bun run check && (bun run check:noncore || true)
scripts.env:deploy: cd ./jurisdictions && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Depository.cjs --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet:base: cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-base.cjs --network base-sepolia
scripts.verify:testnet:base: cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat run scripts/verify-base-deployment.cjs --network base-sepolia
